channel.title: Burger ninja
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Burger ninja" - Just something interesting.

item.title: Re: Burger ninja
item.content:encoded:
Fries are useful if you're doing higher crank Burgerninja missions and need the extra range to possibly succeed. They're also somewhat useful if used in conjunction with some burgers.

But yes, generally you're best off eating a lot of burgers and a few nuggets.

item.title: Burger ninja
item.content:encoded:
im a Jonin Legacy who uses palmface in a bingo once a day, and if im not mistaken i end up with (before the juice bar) 270 stamina.

in dojutsu i am lvl 3 with the allys Lulu and Cici.

while they are in my team, if i max out my apitite with:

Chicken nugets: 5
Tasty burgers: 1
Diet sodas: 1

i end up with a 68.0384% chance to beat a 11d4s

but if:

Tasty burgers: 21
Diet sodas: 6

then i get 91.9812% of succes, and this uses the same apetite

and:

Chicken nugets: 3
Tasty burgers: 9
Diet sodas: 3

97.1313%

edit (just to show fries are useless):

Greassy Fries: 11
Diet sodas: 3

35.2148

what do you guyz think?
